entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Mine Centre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:20 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 26 this morning then rising. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 26 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
